column4: Not that sensitive really - only "remembered" passwords that I'm a bit worried about - I don't want to go all over the place changing passwords
If the OS was installed on a 2 TB partition and less than 100 GB was used - is it safe to assume that overwriting the first 100 GB of the disk is enough? Or could the data be scattered all over ?
depends on how long you had it installed for.
then it'll be all over the partition, not just the first 100gig.
